meanings.definition: Used to express relief, exhaustion, or satisfaction.
meanings.sent1: Phew, that was a close call!
meanings.sent2: I finally finished my homework, phew!
meanings.sent3: Phew, I thought I lost my keys, but they were in my pocket all along.
meanings.sent4: After running the marathon, I collapsed on the ground, phew.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of relief after passing the test was like a big phew of relief.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of relief or exhaustion.
meanings.sent1: Phew, I made it to the bus just in time!
meanings.sent2: After a long day at work, I just want to relax and say phew.
meanings.sent3: Phew, I can't believe I almost forgot my friend's birthday!
meanings.sent4: The weight of the world lifted off my shoulders, phew.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the final buzzer was like a loud phew echoing through the stadium.
